hooks.command: if [ -z "$TMUX" ]; then echo '[Hook] Consider tmux for long-running commands: tmux new -s dev' >&2; fi
echo '[Hook] Note: Consider using pnpm for faster, more efficient installs' >&2
echo '[Hook] Creating .md file - ensure this is necessary' >&2
echo '[Hook] About to push - ensure tests pass: pnpm test' >&2
if [ -f "tsconfig.json" ]; then npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | head -20 || true; fi
if [ -f ".prettierrc" ] || [ -f ".prettierrc.json" ] || [ -f "prettier.config.js" ]; then npx prettier --write "$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if grep -q 'console\.log' "$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; then echo '[Hook] Warning: console.log detected in file' >&2; fi
git diff --name-only 2>/dev/null | xargs -I {} sh -c 'grep -l "console\.log" "{}" 2>/dev/null' | while read f; do echo "[Hook] console.log found in: $f" >&2; done || true
